categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Engle" was the nickname of a clone trooper pilot who served with High Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi's fleet during the Clone Wars.

Engle flew a BTL-B Y-wing starfighter when General Grievous launched an assault on Obi-Wan Kenobi's fleet, but his starfighter was shot down by vulture droids and crashed in the ventral hangar bay of the Negotiator. He miraculously survived the terrifying crash and Kenobi helped Engle to safety from the wreckage of his ship. He evacuated the Negotiator alongside the rest of the crew before its subsequent self-destruction.
